name: mcpn
description: MCP workflow orchestration and registry tool with presets for thinking, coding and more

scripts.inspect: tsc && mkdir -p dist/presets && cp src/presets/*.yaml dist/presets/ && npx @modelcontextprotocol/inspector node -- dist/server.js
scripts.build: tsc && mkdir -p dist/presets && cp src/presets/*.yaml dist/presets/
scripts.test: tsc && mkdir -p dist/presets && cp src/presets/*.yaml dist/presets/ && node --loader ts-node/esm --experimental-specifier-resolution=node node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha.js ./__tests__/*.test.ts ./__tests__/**/*.test.ts

author: Ted Werbel
